Uses of Class
org.asterope.healpix.LongRangeSetBuilder

Uses of LongRangeSetBuilder in org.asterope.healpix
 

Methods in org.asterope.healpix with parameters of type LongRangeSetBuilder
 void PixTools.InRing(long nside, long iz, double phi0, double dphi, LongRangeSetBuilder res)
          returns the list of pixels in RING or NEST scheme with latitude in [phi0 - dpi, phi0 + dphi] on the ring iz in [1, 4*nside -1 ] The pixel id numbers are in [0, 12*nside^2 - 1] the indexing is in RING, unless nest is set to 1
